metadata.title: CVE-2023-52573 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:rds: Fix possible NULL-pointer dereference Inrds_rdma_cm_event_handler_cmn() check, if conn pointer exists beforedereferencing it as rdma_set_service_type() argument Found by LinuxVerification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52573` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-17-generic - 6.5.0-17.17
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-17-generic - 6.5.0-17.17
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-17-generic-64k - 6.5.0-17.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1013-aws - 6.5.0-1013.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.5.0-1013.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1013-gcp - 6.5.0-1013.13
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1009-laptop - 6.5.0-1009.12
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-17-lowlatency - 6.5.0-17.17.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-17-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-17.17.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1015-oracle - 6.5.0-1015.15
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1010-raspi - 6.5.0-1010.13
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1007-starfive - 6.5.0-1007.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-17.17').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1013.13').
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1013.13').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1013.13').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1009.12').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-17.17.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1015.15').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1010.13').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1007.8').
